comment.author: 13167641@N00
comment._content: this is the 3000 block of W. Grace, my father grew up right across the street from these homes and he lived at 3006.

comment.author: 68068571@N06
comment._content: corner of Grace and Wayne.  building hasn't changed much in 50 years...

comment.author: 41730281@N06
comment._content: WOW....I immediately recognized this intersection! I lived at 3008 W Grace as a child...and believe it or not....my name is Wayne. The back of my house faced the parking lot of C.P. Deans. I'm thinking it was around 1969 to 1971 that I lived there.
